MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.AssemblyIdentity FromFile(string path) cil managed
Public Shared Function FromFile (path As String) As AssemblyIdentity

Docs.param: The name of the file from which the identity is to be obtained.
Docs.summary: Obtains identity of the specified assembly. File can be a PE with an embedded xml manifest, a stand-alone xml manifest file, or a .NET assembly. Returns null if identity could not be obtained.
Docs.returns: The assembly identity of the specified file.

Docs.param: The name of the file from which the identity is to be obtained.
Docs.summary: Obtains identity of the specified .NET assembly. File must be a .NET assembly. Returns null if identity could not be obtained.
Docs.returns: The assembly identity of the specified file.

Docs.returns: The assembly identity of the specified file.

Docs.returns: The assembly identity of the specified file.
